name.baseName: Lithium Concentrate Production ; Lithium Spodumene Concentrate (6% Li2O) ; Crushing ; Western Australia Lithium Spodumene Ore (0.8%-0.9% Li2O)
锂精矿生产 ; 锂辉石精矿（氧化锂含量5%） ; 粉碎 ; 西澳锂辉石矿（氧化锂含量0.8%-0.9%）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The lithium spodumene concentrate produced from this process with a lithium oxide (Li2O) content of 6% is intended for use in various applications within the lithium battery manufacturing industry. This high-grade concentrate is typically used as a primary feedstock for the production of lithium compounds that are essential components in the manufacture of rechargeable lithium-ion batteries, ceramics, glass, and other industrial products necessitating high-purity lithium.
该工艺生产的含6%氧化锂（Li2O）的锂辉石精矿，主要用于锂电池制造行业的各种应用。这种高品位精矿通常作为生产锂化合物的主要原料，这些锂化合物是可充电锂离子电池、陶瓷、玻璃及其他需要高纯度锂的工业产品制造中的关键组成部分。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The lithium spodumene concentrate produced from this process with a lithium oxide (Li2O) content of 6% is intended for use in various applications within the lithium battery manufacturing industry. This high-grade concentrate is typically used as a primary feedstock for the production of lithium compounds that are essential components in the manufacture of rechargeable lithium-ion batteries, ceramics, glass, and other industrial products necessitating high-purity lithium.
该工艺生产的含6%氧化锂（Li2O）的锂辉石精矿，主要用于锂电池制造行业的各种应用。这种高品位精矿通常作为生产锂化合物的主要原料，这些锂化合物是可充电锂离子电池、陶瓷、玻璃及其他需要高纯度锂的工业产品制造中的关键组成部分。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Kelly, J. C., Wang, M., Dai, Q. & Winjobi, O. Energy, greenhouse gas, and water life cycle analysis of lithium carbonate and lithium hydroxide monohydrate from brine and ore resources and their use in lithium ion battery cathodes and lithium ion batteries. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 174, 105762 (2021).

Kelly, J. C., Wang, M., Dai, Q. & Winjobi, O. Energy, greenhouse gas, and water life cycle analysis of lithium carbonate and lithium hydroxide monohydrate from brine and ore resources and their use in lithium ion battery cathodes and lithium ion batteries. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 174, 105762 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for life cycle assessment, it is important to note that the production processes for the raw materials and the associated energy flows that contribute less than 1% to the overall process have been excluded. Users should incorporate this dataset in the context of the complete life cycle of lithium-ion battery production, taking care to include appropriate system boundaries that account for all relevant upstream and downstream processes, including extraction, purification, and ultimately battery manufacture. Attention should also be paid to the geographic specificity of the dataset, as it pertains to lithium spodumene ore sourced from Western Australia.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，需注意原材料的生产流程和占总过程小于1%的相关能源流已被排除在外。用户在将此数据集置于锂离子电池生产的完整生命周期背景下使用时，应确保包括合适的系统边界，考虑所有相关的上游和下游过程，包括提取、提纯及最终电池制造。同样需要关注数据集的地理特定性，因为它与源自西澳洲的锂辉石矿石相关。

completeness.common:other: The production processes for raw materials and energy flows with very small amounts (less than 1%) are not included.
原材料的生产流程和极少量（小于 1%）的能源流未包括在内。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
